title: iOS Software Engineer (MSO)
summary: AC Wellness Network LLC is a subsidiary of Apple Inc. and is the dedicated management services organization (MSO) for AC Wellness, a dedicated independent medical group that serves Apple Wellness Centers in Santa Clara Valley. Our mission is to deliver the world’s best healthcare experiences for Apple employees. There is a tremendous opportunity to improve how people manage their health. The MSO is looking for outstanding engineers to help deliver amazing experiences that will address this need in meaningful ways.
description: The MSO is looking for an outstanding and proven iOS Software Engineer to shape outstanding experiences for our employees and customers. We're looking for engineers that have experience developing simple yet powerful user experiences for applications on devices like the iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, and Apple Watch. The ideal candidate wants to solve big problems, enjoys working in an agile and dynamic multi-functional team, and wants to make a huge impact in health.
key_qualifications:
4+ years of software development experience, including experience with the iOS SDK
Excellent coding skills in one or more object-oriented language such as Swift, Objective-C, C++, Java, or Kotlin
Ability to break down large features and implement practical solutions
Outstanding problem solving skills
Superb performance and debugging skills
Excellent spoken and written communication skills
education_experience: BS in Computer Engineering/Computer Science or equivalent experience required.
additional_requirements:
•  Experience working on and shipping iOS applications
•  Solid understanding and experience with iOS Frameworks and back-end integration
•  Passion for digital health
•  Background in health and healthcare a plus
•  This is a site based role.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits. Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
